page.title: 15LIFESTYLES
page.content: Here are examples of some of the fashionable clothes in use by Musselburgh youth. The wellknown names in jeans are Inega and Levis. Most young people shop in Edinburgh in shops such as Chelsea Girl, Top Shop, Clockhouse, Dorothy Perkins. Young ladies like to wear long black, blue, or cerise skirts, and long shirts. They also like coloured boots with flat heels. Young men like to wear trousers which are baggy at the top and tight at the legs and black flat heeled shoes. For hairstyles flat-tops (like crew cut) are fashionable. For lipstick the fashionable colour is pinky-purple. For jewellry, diamante earings and broaches are worn. Young men like to wear leather ties and pink and yellow shirts.
